captions.text: One of my friends is like, "aw, you don't know what it is?"
And I was like, "Oh!" But I still didn't really know what it was.
*Music*
Everytime I though of a vagina, I was convinced that it was just one hole.
I remember definitely thinking that the vagina was like, flat.
In front, like it was just below the belly button.
I assumed that women had the same genitals that I did.
And then it was like separated into three separate tunnels.
for the poop, the pee and the baby.
I remember very specifically seeing a picture of a naked women and saying, "she doesn't have anything down there"
"What? What's going on?"
I wasn't sure like what was supposed- I knew it was supposed to go in a hole.
The male took his penis and rubbed it on top of the vagina. Not inside the vagina.
A man lied this way and a woman lied this way.
I wasn't sure like how, where?
I always though missionary was just the way you had sex to make a baby. And when you were a heathen, you would do it doggy-style.
Because that would get it into Willy Wonka's chocolate factory.
I was looking for a blank VHS tape so I could record an episode of Mystery Science Theater 3000.
I put it in and it was very close up of a woman's vagina.
And the woman's face comes into the frame and I'm like, "What is going on!"
Suddenly you would hear people going down the stairs and you'd be like, "Oh, My GOD!"
I remember one time I got here, that was fine and
I close the tabs and I close them but there was pop-ups and my mom came around.
And then she clicked on it and it was this pop-up and it was like way dirtier than the stuff I was watching.
But you're not going to be like, "No I wasn't watching that porn! I was watching other porn!"
I just wanted to watch a couple robots and a man make fun of a B-movie. I got so much more.
My parent were just like, "I'm never going to talk about sex to Keith and he'll never have sex"
Every time I tried to have a sex talk with my mom, her like instinctive response is, "don't do it, you're dick will get cancer."
And I was like, "F&%#... I will never stick my penis in another person."
I can't remember how he said it but he basically wanted to start a conversation.
about sex and then he was like, "Don't worry..."
"I lost my virginity when I was 15, and it was with an older girl"
and I was like, "Well, I'm 16 and I still have't lost my virginity.."
"and this is the worst, most embarrassing conversation we can possibly have right now!"
"Shut up, how do I stop this conversation?!"

title: Guys' Misconceptions about Sex (When They Were Younger)
